channel.title: [MAYA] Harley
channel.description:
Well, its been a long time since my last model, and since my last model I have completely switched over to maya. After a couple days it wasn't too hard to model in and in some ways easier but I have spent probably a month on this model, spending hours a day on it and am very happy with it. The texture and material system maya has is very confusing, thats why there is no tire tread because half this day was just texturing and I was like screw this a few min ago and it looked fine in my last renders.
[img]http://i110.photobucket.com/albums/n94/archerer98/motofin.jpg[/img]
[img]http://i110.photobucket.com/albums/n94/archerer98/motofin2.jpg[/img]
Will probably get more views and post here in a bit.

item.title: [MAYA] Harley
item.dc:creator: @SomethingToHide STH
item.description:
@SomethingToHide wrote:

That is brushed metal.

Read full topic

item.title: [MAYA] Harley
item.dc:creator: @archerer98 Archer
item.description:
@archerer98 wrote:

[quote=“SomethingToHide, post:27, topic:269007”][quote author=Archer link=topic=355042.msg2722690#msg2722690 date=1238101367]

The entire thing just feels too soft and plastic-ey to me.
Where’s all the metal, and the car paint and stuff?

Only the seat and tires look soft, the frame and handle bars have the body paint and rest has kinda of brushed black material.

Find a way to get this bitch into c4d and do a nice render

It can’t be done, I have looked on google and found people trying to do exactly that and it can’t be done. I don’t care though, I am almost completely done with c4d other than something I am doing in it right now but am trying to get into maya.
[/quote]

I already did it with that Maya file you sent me…

And I see no brushed black metal.
Only matte black like everywhere lol.[/quote]

Well I am sticking to maya, I don’t mind the render. And I said it is kinda like brushed metal…like its a solid black metal.

Read full topic

item.description:

[quote=“Archer, post:19, topic:269007”][quote author=SomethingToHide link=topic=355042.msg2719857#msg2719857 date=1237915875]

The images look blurry.
[/quote]

Thats mental ray for you, thats one thing I have been trying to fix but this is best I can get right now and I don’t mind.[/quote]

Hit alt+prtscreen. Save it as .png

Because you save it as .jpg, it gets blurry.

item.title: [MAYA] Harley
item.dc:creator: @SomethingToHide STH
item.description:
@SomethingToHide wrote:

[quote=“runescape3dude, post:7, topic:269007”][quote author=Taharok link=topic=355042.msg2718242#msg2718242 date=1237772066]
I think it looks quite good. Not far off from looking realistic.
[/quote]

You either have bad eyes or everything looks really unrealistic in America. (No offense meant)[/quote]

What about it looks unrealistic?

It doesn’t look “unrealistic.” It just doesn’t hold up when it comes to suspension of disbelief.

Although if this had better materials and you modeled a nice scene for it, it could definitely confuse some.

Read full topic

item.description:
@archerer98 wrote:

[quote=“Davidude, post:8, topic:269007”][quote author=Archer link=topic=355042.msg2718259#msg2718259 date=1237773202]
Tomorrow I am going to work on the tire texture, but for now heres another view.

[img]http://i110.photobucket.com/albums/n94/archerer98/motofin3.jpg[ /img]

(I know it looks like the front is floating in this view)
[/quote]
Of course it looks like it’s floating, its on a kick stand…[/quote]

Can’t even see the kickstand in that view so that’s not what I am talking about lol.[quote=“runescape3dude, post:7, topic:269007”][quote author=Taharok link=topic=355042.msg2718242#msg2718242 date=1237772066]
I think it looks quite good. Not far off from looking realistic.
[/quote]

You either have bad eyes or everything looks really unrealistic in America. (No offense meant)[/quote]

I will continue working on the materials but it is quite confusing so may take bit of time for a realistic one.

Read full topic
